QuestData.Title: A Personal Summons
QuestData.Description: <An unfamiliar feeling wells up from deep within you, flooding your mind with thoughts and images.>$b$bHear my words, $n.$b$bOur world finds itself in the grip of a terrible crisis.$b$bI call upon you to lend your aid in this desperate hour.$b$bI am Krogar.$b$bSeek me out at once, and your destiny shall be revealed.$b$bYou can find me north of the Drag in Orgrimmar.
QuestData.LogDescription: Farseer Krogar wants you to meet him in Orgrimmar.
